title: Found a Booster

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: So as you can see im in the looking for group chat when i came along this guy spamming elo boosting hopfully this is a perm ban elo booster should not be aloud this was on Oceania.

replies.body: Riot have a policy of no naming and shaming, but chances are since he is offering the boosts for free he is probably not boosting at all haha
